Name: MicroRC Simulation
About the game: MicroRC Simulation is a driving simulator for radio-controlled toy cars. You must practise to learn the different tracks and conquer the podium.This is not an arcade game, as practise is required to win the races. The A.I. doesn't follow a predefined path, but reads the track in real time. Get in game experience to unlock the accessories that will help you to win against highly skilled competitives.
